Kim Il Sung's Portrait presented to Bulgarians
   Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Badges bearing the President Kim Il Sung 's Portrait  were presented to the members of the Juche Idea Study Group of Bulgaria on the occasion of Sun's Day. A presentation ceremony was held on March 5.   Present at the ceremony were the members of the group and the DPRK ambassador to Bulgaria.   Speakers at the ceremony vowed to more actively introduce the greatness of President Kim Il Sung  and widely disseminate the Juche idea, carrying those badges on their chests.

articles.content:
South Korea to participate in "99 western pacific exercises"
   Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The South Korean authorities announced South Korea would participate in "99 western pacific exercises" sponsored by "7th U.S. fleet command" from March 15 for the first time, according to a Seoul-based radio.   The radio said the authorities will dispatch their forces including a convoy and a submarine to the exercises, which are scheduled to last till April 3 in the waters off Guam Island.   The exercises have been conducted every 2 years since 1991, with U.S. as its main axis.

British national preparatory committee inaugurated
   Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A British national preparatory committee to commemorate Sun's Day was inaugurated in London on the occasion of the President Kim Il Sung 's 87th birth anniversary.   The committee decided to hold various events including commemoration meeting, Korean books, photograph and handiwork exhibition and called on the peace-loving progressive British forces and the world revolutionary people to commemorate the day as a joint festival.

DPRK-Japan relations discussed
   Tokyo, March 11 (KNS-KCNA) -- The participants in the 5th general meeting of the Okayama prefectural people's forum for Japan-DPRK friendship called for undertaking widespread activities for establishing the relations of trust between the DPRK and Japan for an earlier normalization of the bilateral relations and the peaceful reunification of Korea.   The meeting discussed and decided on intensifying the movement for promoting the DPRK-Japan friendship among figures from all walks of life including activities for lifting voices for an earlier normalization of the DPRK-Japan relations and stronger friendship and solidarity between the two countries and helping the Japanese people have correct understanding of the DPRK.
